title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Al Michaels on Madden, "Miracle" Call, Mike Silver on Harbaugh 2Pt Try, Urban Flameout + Week 16 Bets
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Al Michaels on Madden, "Miracle" Call, Mike Silver on Harbaugh 2Pt Try, Urban Flameout + Week 16 Bets
description:
It's the best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast! First, it's top takes of the week, including a telling stat about Dak Prescott (3:00), and what Mac Jones and Tua Tagovailoa are showing the league (5:00). Then, legendary broadcaster Al Michaels tells Colin for a great conversation about his incredible career in sports. They discuss how he made the switch from MLB to NFL play-by-play (9:00), the first time he ever worked with John Madden (13:00), his future in broadcasting (18:00), and behind-the-scenes details from his iconic "Miracle on Ice" call (25:00). Then, longtime NFL writer Mike Silver joins Colin to discuss that failed Ravens 2-pt conversion (34:00), why Urban Meyer flamed out with the Jaguars (38:00, and the story behind Mike's book which became the new movie "American Underdog" (42:00). Finally, The Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if his week 16 Bills/Patriots (49:00), Saints/Dolphins (50:00) Browns/Packers (51:00), and picks are "sharp" or "square".

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
